mapper.select: SELECT md.meal_id, i.ingredient_name as 'ingredientName', i.type_id, i.ingredient_id, i.calories as 'ingredientCalories', md.calories as 'targetCaloriesMax', md.weight as 'targetCaloriesMin' FROM meal_detail md left join ingredient i on md.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE meal_id = #{mealId}

select i1.ingredient_name as 'ingredientName', i1.ingredient_id, i1.type_id, i1.calories as 'ingredientCalories', tmp.targetCaloriesMax as 'targetCaloriesMax', tmp.targetCaloriesMin as 'targetCaloriesMin' from ingredient i1 join (select i.type_id, md.calories as 'targetCaloriesMax', md.weight as 'targetCaloriesMin' from ingredient i right join meal_detail md on i.ingredient_id = md.ingredient_id where md.meal_id = #{mealId} and md.ingredient_id = #{ingredientId}) tmp on i1.type_id = tmp.type_id
